mapper.select:
select
from
and tenant_id = #{tenantId}
and brand_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{brandId}), '%')
and brand_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{brandName}), '%')
and brand_logo like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{brandLogo}), '%')
and company_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{companyName}), '%')
and brand_uscc like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{brandUscc}), '%')
and connect_uname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{connectUname}), '%')
and connect_mobile_no like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{connectMobileNo}), '%')
and connect_wechat_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{connectWechatId}), '%')
and brand_desc like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{brandDesc}), '%')
and company_desc like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{companyDesc}), '%')
and brand_detail like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{brandDetail}), '%')
and company_detail like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{companyDetail}), '%')
and vaild_date like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{vaildDate}), '%')
and expired_date like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{expiredDate}), '%')
and brand_fee like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{brandFee}), '%')
and brand_margin like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{brandMargin}), '%')
and remark like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{remark}), '%')
and status like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{status}), '%')
and brand_common_desc like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{brandCommonDesc}), '%')
mapper.insert:
insert into
( tenant_id ,brand_id ,brand_name ,brand_logo ,company_name ,brand_uscc ,connect_uname ,connect_mobile_no ,connect_wechat_id ,brand_desc ,company_desc ,brand_detail ,company_detail ,vaild_date ,expired_date ,brand_fee ,brand_margin ,remark ,status ,brand_common_desc) values
( #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.brandId}, #{entity.brandName}, #{entity.brandLogo}, #{entity.companyName}, #{entity.brandUscc}, #{entity.connectUname}, #{entity.connectMobileNo}, #{entity.connectWechatId}, #{entity.brandDesc}, #{entity.companyDesc}, #{entity.brandDetail}, #{entity.companyDetail}, #{entity.vaildDate}, #{entity.expiredDate}, #{entity.brandFee}, #{entity.brandMargin}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.brandCommonDesc})
on duplicate key update tenant_id =values(tenant_id) ,brand_id =values(brand_id) ,brand_name =values(brand_name) ,brand_logo =values(brand_logo) ,company_name =values(company_name) ,brand_uscc =values(brand_uscc) ,connect_uname =values(connect_uname) ,connect_mobile_no =values(connect_mobile_no) ,connect_wechat_id =values(connect_wechat_id) ,brand_desc =values(brand_desc) ,company_desc =values(company_desc) ,brand_detail =values(brand_detail) ,company_detail =values(company_detail) ,vaild_date =values(vaild_date) ,expired_date =values(expired_date) ,brand_fee =values(brand_fee) ,brand_margin =values(brand_margin) ,remark =values(remark) ,status =values(status) ,brand_common_desc =values(brand_common_desc)
